supporting_quotes: Jane Doe was born on March 15, 1975 in Springfield.
Jane Doe has served as a Member of Parliament since January 2020.
She was appointed Minister of Education in June 2022.

intro.title: Welcome to PoliLoom!
intro.description: You're about to help build accurate, open political data by verifying information extracted from official sources.
intro.secondaryDescription: Let's take a quick tour to show you how it works.

archivedPage.title: Source Documents
archivedPage.description: On the right side, you'll see archived web pages from government portals, Wikipedia, and other official sources.
archivedPage.secondaryDescription: These are the original documents where we found information about politicians. We save copies so you can verify the data even if the original page changes.

structuredData.title: Extracted Data
structuredData.description: On the left, you see structured data that was automatically extracted from the source documents using AI.
structuredData.secondaryDescription: Your job is to verify if this extracted data is correct by checking it against the source document.

tryYourself1.title: Try It Yourself
tryYourself1.description: Now it's your turn! Review the data and click Accept or Reject.

multiplePages.title: Multiple Sources
multiplePages.description: Sometimes information comes from different source documents.
multiplePages.secondaryDescription: Click the "View" button next to any data item to see its source document.

tryYourself2.title: Try Multiple Sources
tryYourself2.description: Review these positions from different sources.

complete.title: Tutorial Complete!
complete.description: Great job! You now know how to:
bullets: View source documents with highlighted text
Review extracted data and accept or reject it
Handle multiple sources for different data
